name: Imtiaz
text: Very Very Good Movie,happy to watch

name: sani
text: One of the better Bollywood movies I saw

name: saad
text: This inspires me to watch more Bollywood movies

text: Touching story of friendship, drama and adventure from Bollywood!

text: Scarcely has a comedy provided its audience with so much insight, intelligence, and human affection

name: asif
text: If this had come from Hollywood and not Bollywood it might have cleaned up at the Oscars
